TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter

summary.span: オブジェクトを他の型のオブジェクトとの間で変換するための型コンバーターを提供します。

span.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このクラスは、書き込みのためのメソッドもあります、を[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)]パッケージ、読み取り、から、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)]を表す文字列が指定されたパッケージ、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]のです。This class also has methods for writing a to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] package and reading a from an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package that is given a string that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the . 基本クラスを参照してくださいとの重要な使用上の注意します。See the base classes and for important usage notes.
